definition: foreign (non-Chinese)/barbarian/classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance)/classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc)/classifier for situations: kind, sort
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: To declare that the New Fourth Army has "mutinied" and cancel its official designation.
sentences.chinese: 宣佈新四軍“叛變”，取消該軍番號。

sentences.english: Remove unit patches, name tags, rank insignia, etc.
sentences.chinese: 移除部隊番號，胸牌，軍銜等。

definition: lit. the salted fish turns over (idiom)/fig. to experience a reversal of fortune
variant of 獨角戲|独角戏[du2 jiao3 xi4]
to plan a military mission on a sand table (idiom)/to rehearse a planned action or activity/to conduct a dry run
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
the Kempeitai or Japanese Military Police 1881-1945 (Japanese counterpart of the Gestapo during WWII)
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
to seize total victory (idiom); an overwhelming victory/to win by a landslide (in election)
